locations.name: Cleanaway Lucas Heights Resource Recovery Park - Transfer Station
locations.address: Little Forest Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2234
locations.openingHours: ed in 1987, the Lucas Heights Resource Recovery Park spans approximately 165 hectares and over 157,0
locations.content: The SUEZ Lucas Heights facility helps divert organics from going to landfill by converting it into high-quality composts and soil conditioners. The capacity of this facility is 50,000 tonnes of organic materials per year. Opened in 1987, the Lucas Heights Resource Recovery Park spans approximately 165 hectares and over 157,000 cars and trucks use the park each year.

locations.name: Cleanaway Auburn Resource Recovery Centre - Sydney Olympic Park - Transfer Station
locations.address: Old Hill Link, Sydney, New South Wales, 2127
locations.content: The Auburn Resource Recovery Centre provides drop-off facilities for waste disposal and recycling within Sydney.

locations.name: Cleanaway Artarmon Resource Recovery Centre - Transfer Station
locations.address: 12 Lanceley Place, Sydney, New South Wales, 2064
locations.openingHours: ed in 1998 and upgraded in 2015, our Artarmon centre is located just off Sydney’s Pacific Highway
locations.content: Opened in 1998 and upgraded in 2015, our Artarmon centre is located just off Sydney’s Pacific Highway. It provides reliable and accessible waste disposal for residents, businesses and local councils in the city’s central and northern suburbs.

locations.name: Cleanaway Ryde Resource Recovery Centre - North Ryde - Transfer Station
locations.address: Wicks Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2113
locations.openingHours: ing in 1995, our waste management centre at Ryde has provided a convenient service for the disposal
locations.content: Since opening in 1995, our waste management centre at Ryde has provided a convenient service for the disposal and recycling of a broad range of materials to residents, businesses and local councils in Sydney’s north and north-west.

locations.name: Cleanaway Belrose Resource Recovery Centre - Transfer Station
locations.address: Crozier Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2085

locations.name: SUEZ Seven Hills Resource Recovery Centre - Transfer Station
locations.address: Powers Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2147
locations.openingHours: ed in 1998 and is  24 a day on weekdays
locations.content: SUEZ waste management centre at Seven Hills opened in 1998 and is open 24 hours a day on weekdays. The 1.8-hectare site services residents, businesses and local councils across Sydney’s west and north-west, allowing for the disposal and recycling of a broad range of materials.

locations.name: Veolia Wetherill Resource Recovery Facility - Transfer Station
locations.address: Davis Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2164
locations.content: Our Resource Recovery & Recycling Facilities provide a consolidation point for unsorted material collected from residential or commercial premises and from public drop-off facilities. These facilities are purpose built to accept, process and transform materials into valuable, beneficial products for reuse.

locations.name: Veolia Eastern Creek Resource Recovery Park - Transfer Station
locations.address: Wallgrove Road, Sydney, New South Wales, 2766
locations.content: Eastern Creek Resource Recovery Park in Sydney’s west is home to two innovative waste processing facilities: an ORRF, diverting organics from landfill and converting them into valuable resources for healthy plant growth; and an ARRT, which uses advanced specialist technologies to recover and recycle more from waste. Together, these facilities lead the change from traditional waste disposal to economically sustainable resource recovery solutions.

locations.name: Resource Recoveries and Recycling - Sheldon - Rubbish Tip
locations.address: 706 Mount Cotton Road, Queensland, 4157
acceptedMaterials: Cars & Other Vehicles|Clothes & Textiles|Construction Material|Electronics|Green Waste|Metals|Paper & Cardboard|Plastics|Rubber
locations.content: When the different materials are seperarted before being loaded, the gate rate will decrease because it will be easier to sort through the commercial/industrial waste. When renovating or demolishing, a handy tip would be to seperate your waste before hiring a skip to reduce air space and the recycling fee.

locations.name: West Metro Recycling - Shenton Park - Recycling Centre
locations.address: Jfr Mcgeough Resource Recovery Facility, 60 Lemnos St, Shenton Park WA 6008, Australia
acceptedMaterials: Batteries|Cars & Other Vehicles|Chemicals & Liquids|Clothes & Textiles|Construction Material|Electronics|Furniture|Green Waste|Metals|Paper & Cardboard|Plastics|Rubber
locations.content: To help you manage your waste wisely, the WMRC provides comprehensive waste recycling, treatment and disposal services for acceptable items, seven days a week, for residents, businesses and councils. In its capacity as a transfer station, the West Metro Recycling Centre aggregates, compacts and loads large volumes of municipal solid waste into silos for effective and efficient transfer to distant sites for appropriate treatment or disposal.

locations.name: Balcatta Recycling Centre
locations.address: Balcatta Road, Western Australia, 6021
acceptedMaterials: Batteries|Cars & Other Vehicles|Chemicals & Liquids|Clothes & Textiles|Construction Material|Electronics|Furniture|Green Waste|Metals|Paper & Cardboard|Plastics|Rubber
locations.openingHours: ing , fees and what items you can dispose of
locations.content: The City of Stirling has a dedicated recycling centre, where you can dispose of recyclables and reusable items, household hazardous waste, general waste and car tyres. Find out about location, opening hours, fees and what items you can dispose of.

locations.name: Mandurah Tip: Transfer Station - Parklands
locations.address: 100 Gordon Rd, Parklands WA 6180, Australia
locations.content: Cleanaway operates Mandurah’s transfer station. As alliance partner of the City of Mandurah, Cleanaway provides residential and business waste management services throughout Mandurah. To find out residential & commercial rubbish tip fees & acceptable wastes, visit our website.

locations.name: Brajkovich Demolition and Salvage - Bullsbrook - Rubbish Tip
locations.address: Walyunga Road, Western Australia

locations.name: Edinburgh North Resource Recovery Centre - Transfer Station
locations.address: Gate, 3 Bellchambers Rd, Edinburgh North SA 5113, Australia
locations.content: The Northern Adelaide Waste Management Authority has two Resource Recovery Centres (RRC) where residents of the Salisbury, Playford and Gawler Councils can donate, recycle and dispose of a range of items. Trucks up to 3 tonne tare are welcome to access both facilities (contact Edinburgh North RRC for exceptions with heavier vehicles).
